fields.name: A4 Lined Notebook
fields.description: This A4 lined notebook is perfect for students and office use. 200 pages with smooth, thick paper prevent ink bleed. Durable binding ensures long-lasting use. Ideal for notes, journaling, and assignments.
fields.key_features:
200 pages
Smooth thick paper
Durable binding
A4 size
Perfect for students and professionals
Multipurpose use

fields.title: Excellent quality
fields.content: Pages are thick and smooth, writing feels great.

fields.title: Perfect for office
fields.content: Good size and sturdy cover, very useful for daily notes.

fields.name: Sketchbook Pad
fields.description: A high-quality sketchbook pad with 100 sheets of acid-free paper. Ideal for pencil, charcoal, and ink sketches. Thick pages prevent bleed-through and tearing. Perfect for students and professional artists.
fields.key_features:
100 sheets
Acid-free paper
Thick pages
Suitable for pencil, charcoal, ink
Durable cover
Portable size

fields.title: Great sketchbook
fields.content: Paper quality is excellent, perfect for detailed sketches.

fields.title: Nice and sturdy
fields.content: Cover is solid and pages are thick enough for my art.

fields.name: Graph Notebook
fields.one_line_heading: Perfect notebook for math and engineering
fields.description: Graph notebook with 100 pages, ideal for plotting, drawing, and engineering calculations. Durable binding and smooth paper quality make it long-lasting and easy to use.

Graph paper
Durable binding
Smooth paper
Aids in plotting and calculations

fields.title: Very useful
fields.content: Great for math assignments and plotting graphs.

fields.title: Good quality
fields.content: Paper is smooth and squares are accurate.

fields.name: Sticky Notes Pack
fields.description: Pack of 6 vibrant sticky notes pads. Strong adhesive and bright colors make them ideal for reminders, notes, and bookmarks. Each pad contains 100 sheets.

100 sheets each

Strong adhesive
Easy to remove
Multipurpose use

fields.title: Very handy

fields.title: Useful for notes
fields.content: Perfect for keeping reminders on my desk and books.
